mapper.insert: INSERT INTO quiz(week_id, quiz_no, question, correct_answer, explanation, type, started_at, ended_at) VALUES((SELECT week_id from lecture_week WHERE lecture_id=#{lectureId} AND WEEK=#{week}), #{quizNo}, #{question}, #{correctAnswer},#{explanation},#{type},#{startedAt},#{endedAt})

INSERT INTO quiz_option(quiz_id, `option`) VALUES((SELECT quiz_id FROM quiz WHERE week_id= (SELECT week_id FROM lecture_week WHERE lecture_id=#{quizForm.lectureId} AND WEEK=#{quizForm.week}) AND quiz_no=#{quizForm.quizNo}),#{option})
mapper.update: UPDATE quiz_submission SET answer=#{answer} WHERE submission_id=#{submissionId}

UPDATE quiz_submission qs INNER JOIN quiz_join qj ON qs.join_id = qj.join_id INNER JOIN quiz q ON qj.week_id = q.week_id AND qs.quiz_no = q.quiz_no SET qs.is_correct = CASE WHEN qs.answer = q.correct_answer THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHERE qs.join_id = #{joinId};
UPDATE quiz_join SET score = #{correctQuestion}/#{totalQuestion}*100 WHERE join_id=#{joinId}
